topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557a67fe63687253e2001d6e#post_557a67fe63687253e2001d6e
You know what is interesting when you think about it?  Birds are dinosaurs; or more accurately all modern birds probably evolved from a common ancestor the same way that humans evolved from a common ancestor.

Life has almost been completely wiped out numerous times on earth and yet life finds a way; there's been five times where the overwhelming majority of life has been wiped out and yet it bounces back again and again and again.
